Aries_Sun_PD1.name: AriesSunPD1
Aries_Sun_PD1.description: The Dasa of the Sun in Aries in deep exaltation.- Sudden gains in cattle and wealth, much traveling in eastern countries, residence in foreign countries, quarrels among friends and relations, pleasure trips and picnic parties and company of beautiful women.

Taurus_Sun_PD1.name: TaurusSunPD1
Taurus_Sun_PD1.description: Taurus - Increase in landed properties, fame among relations and friends, cultivation of love and reverence for holy people and saints.

Gemini_Sun_PD1.name: GeminiSunPD1
Gemini_Sun_PD1.description: Gemini - Much wealth, education, inclination to interest oneself in music and such other fine arts, and generally happy and cheerful.

Cancer_Sun_PD1.name: CancerSunPD1
Cancer_Sun_PD1.description: Cancer - Political success, always gay and happy, traveling in foreign countries and increase in lands, houses and wealth.

Leo_Sun_PD1.name: LeoSunPD1
Leo_Sun_PD1.description: Leo - Respect from kings and noble personages, righteous conduct, birth of children and respect among children.

Virgo_Sun_PD1.name: VirgoSunPD1
Virgo_Sun_PD1.description: Virgo - Suffering off and on from physical complaints, loss of cattle, wealth and house and misunderstandings with close relatives and friends.

Libra_Sun_PD1.name: LibraSunPD1
Libra_Sun_PD1.description: Libra - Reduced to poverty, troubled by enemies, failure in undertakings, death of brothers and friends and miserable and complicated life.

Scorpio_Sun_PD1.name: ScorpioSunPD1
Scorpio_Sun_PD1.description: Scorpio - Starting new schemes and enterprises, realization of many ambitious things, travelling in hilly tracts and countries.

Sagittarius_Sun_PD1.name: SagittariusSunPD1
Sagittarius_Sun_PD1.description: Sagittarius - Happiness, success in undertakings, good health, destruction of enemies, satisfaction in every way.

Capricorn_Sun_PD1.name: CapricornSunPD1
Capricorn_Sun_PD1.description: Capricorn - A wandering life, loss of patrimony, self-respect and good name, misunderstanding among his own people.

Aquarius_Sun_PD1.name: AquariusSunPD1
Aquarius_Sun_PD1.description: Aquarius - Mental worries, loss or illness to wife, loss of property and wealth.

Pisces_Sun_PD1.name: PiscesSunPD1
Pisces_Sun_PD1.description: Pisces - Gains in wealth, auspicious celebrations, respect among relations, increase in family members and smooth sailing in every way.

Aries_Moon_PD1.name: AriesMoonPD1
Aries_Moon_PD1.description: The Moon in Aries - Physical and mental happiness, gains in wealth and perfect contentment.

Taurus_Moon_PD1.name: TaurusMoonPD1
Taurus_Moon_PD1.description: Taurus - Increase in fame and name, collection of enormous wealth, mental and physical happiness.

Gemini_Moon_PD1.name: GeminiMoonPD1
Gemini_Moon_PD1.description: Gemini - Progress in education and acquiring of much immovable and movable properties.

Cancer_Moon_PD1.name: CancerMoonPD1
Cancer_Moon_PD1.description: Cancer - Addition in wealth, success in litigation, unexpected findings of treasure, travels.

Leo_Moon_PD1.name: LeoMoonPD1
Leo_Moon_PD1.description: Leo - Progress in education, much gains from unexpected sources.

Virgo_Moon_PD1.name: VirgoMoonPD1
Virgo_Moon_PD1.description: Virgo - Death of serious illness to mother, worries from enemies and swindlers, mental and physical restlessness.

Libra_Moon_PD1.name: LibraMoonPD1
Libra_Moon_PD1.description: Libra - Gains in wealth, increase in friends, visits to holy places and shrines, realisation of schemes and destruction of enemies.

Scorpio_Moon_PD1.name: ScorpioMoonPD1
Scorpio_Moon_PD1.description: Scorpio - Fear from political heads, destruction of relatives, disappointments in every respect, loss of wealth, liberty and honor at risk and much mental uneasiness.

Sagittarius_Moon_PD1.name: SagittariusMoonPD1
Sagittarius_Moon_PD1.description: Sagittarius - Domestic happiness and felicity, celebration of happy functions, accumulation of wealth and undisturbed progress of normal private affairs.

Capricorn_Moon_PD1.name: CapricornMoonPD1
Capricorn_Moon_PD1.description: Capricorn - Increase in lands and houses and wealth, success in every new enterprise, pilgrimages to holy places and success in litigation.

Aquarius_Moon_PD1.name: AquariusMoonPD1
Aquarius_Moon_PD1.description: Aquarius - Destruction of property, fear from political authorities, mental worries from enemies, misunderstandings among relatives and friends.

Pisces_Moon_PD1.name: PiscesMoonPD1
Pisces_Moon_PD1.description: Pisces - Taking charges of fresh office, reciting religious texts and moral codes and easy access to anything coveted without effort.

Aries_Mars_PD1.name: AriesMarsPD1
Aries_Mars_PD1.description: Aries - Acquisition of wealth, increase in reputation and respect, much gain.

Taurus_Mars_PD1.name: TaurusMarsPD1
Taurus_Mars_PD1.description: Taurus - Destruction of enemies, success in all struggles, respect from elders and rulers and good produce from lands.

Gemini_Mars_PD1.name: GeminiMarsPD1
Gemini_Mars_PD1.description: Gemini - Access to great wealth, preciousÂ· stones and me~ agricultural success, general success in all undertakings.

Cancer_Mars_PD1.name: CancerMarsPD1
Cancer_Mars_PD1.description: Cancer - Danger from enemies, of honour and reputation, domestic disharmony and misunderstandings among brothers or close relatives.

Leo_Mars_PD1.name: LeoMarsPD1
Leo_Mars_PD1.description: Leo - Happy and successful all through the period of 7 years, taste in fine arts and material gains through them, increase of income from house and lands.

Virgo_Mars_PD1.name: VirgoMarsPD1
Virgo_Mars_PD1.description: Virgo - Beneficial results, successful termination of educational pursuits, ability to address meetings and deliver lectures, and happiness from relatives and friends.

Libra_Mars_PD1.name: LibraMarsPD1
Libra_Mars_PD1.description: Libra - Most miserable life, misunderstandings with cousins and brothers, death of wife and children, loss of wealth and grains and mortgaging of landed property.

Scorpio_Mars_PD1.name: ScorpioMarsPD1
Scorpio_Mars_PD1.description: Scorpio - Increase in wealth, good earnings, friendship and intimacy with exalted personages, love for own people, always happy and active.

Sagittarius_Mars_PD1.name: SagittariusMarsPD1
Sagittarius_Mars_PD1.description: Sagittarius - Earnings from political or royal sources, courting their friendships, destruction of enemies and realisation of all hopes and desires.

Capricorn_Mars_PD1.name: CapricornMarsPD1
Capricorn_Mars_PD1.description: Capricorn - Success in battles and respect for military skill, gains from quadrupeds and increase in wealth.

Aquarius_Mars_PD1.name: AquariusMarsPD1
Aquarius_Mars_PD1.description: Aquarius - Great hardships and difficulties, misunderstandings with rulers and the immediate superiors in office, unpleasant relations with mother and servants.

Pisces_Mars_PD1.name: PiscesMarsPD1
Pisces_Mars_PD1.description: Pisces - Much wealth, general success and happiness. bumper crops in lands, prosperity and acquisition of house and business, respect as a learned man, great reputation.

Aries_Rahu_PD1.name: AriesRahuPD1
Aries_Rahu_PD1.description: Rahu In Aries - Auspicious celebrations in the house, recitations of sacred texts, acquisition of tracts of land, perfect domestic happiness, respect from rulers and a life of harmony in every respect.

Taurus_Rahu_PD1.name: TaurusRahuPD1
Taurus_Rahu_PD1.description: Taurus - Pilgrimages to shrines and holy places, increase in philosophical knowledge, entertainments, gains from cattle and dealings with quadrupeds.

Gemini_Rahu_PD1.name: GeminiRahuPD1
Gemini_Rahu_PD1.description: Gemini - Multiplication of enemies, always peevish and short tempered, fear from police and magistrates, sickness to wife and family, misunderstandings and disfavour.

Cancer_Rahu_PD1.name: CancerRahuPD1
Cancer_Rahu_PD1.description: Cancer - Serving the suffering, humanitarian propaganda, zeal and enthusiasm for national service, gains and increase in wealth, riches and honour and great reputation.

Leo_Rahu_PD1.name: LeoRahuPD1
Leo_Rahu_PD1.description: Leo - Fear of imprisonment of fraud and deception or misappropriation or political offenses, destruction of property and mental worries distractions.

Virgo_Rahu_PD1.name: VirgoRahuPD1
Virgo_Rahu_PD1.description: Virgo - Gain in wealth, general prosperity and success, acquisition of new lands, elevation to exalted positions, respect for learning, sexual happiness and domestic harmony, birth of children and sudden access to much wealth.

Libra_Rahu_PD1.name: LibraRahuPD1
Libra_Rahu_PD1.description: Libra - Destruction of property, loss of wealth, waste of agricultural products, loss of position, fear of imprisonment, residence in foreign countries-rather in exile, many miseries, hardships, business failure, litigation troubles and physical and mental sufferings.

Scorpio_Rahu_PD1.name: ScorpioRahuPD1
Scorpio_Rahu_PD1.description: Scorpio - Rahu is debilitated here and as such, causes great havoc to the native. The results in Rahu's Dasa will be :-abortion, loss of children, inclination to bid farewell to moral aspect of life, failure in business enterprises and mental discontentment.

Sagittarius_Rahu_PD1.name: SagittariusRahuPD1
Sagittarius_Rahu_PD1.description: Sagittarius - Acquisition of wealth, sudden and unexpected gain without effort, great success in any undertakings, loss of near and dear relatives and mental unrest.

Capricorn_Rahu_PD1.name: CapricornRahuPD1
Capricorn_Rahu_PD1.description: Capricorn - Sudden promotions to higher positions, recognition of one's merits by the State and rulers, marriage festivities at home, increase of wealth and general prosperity.

Aquarius_Rahu_PD1.name: AquariusRahuPD1
Aquarius_Rahu_PD1.description: Aquarius - Orphanage, disappointments, mental derangement and affection, sorrowful news, loss of wife or children, premature death and mean instincts.

Pisces_Rahu_PD1.name: PiscesRahuPD1
Pisces_Rahu_PD1.description: Pisces - Great fear in life from thieves, swindlers and such people, inclination to matrimonial alliance, progress of education, some gains, ill health and mental uneasiness. Rahu in Pisces gives mixed results - his position, viz., whether he is in a friendly or unfriendly sign, in the house of loss or gain, wife or children, etc., should be correctly determined.

Aries_Jupiter_PD1.name: AriesJupiterPD1
Aries_Jupiter_PD1.description: Jupiter in Aries - Acquisition of landed property, general prosperity and success in all undertakings and litigations, elevation to a responsible office or appointment as a trustee and great respect from his or her own people.

Taurus_Jupiter_PD1.name: TaurusJupiterPD1
Taurus_Jupiter_PD1.description: Taurus - If a king or a president - access to new territories, fresh treaties and pacts, if an ordinary person - acquisition of wealth, establishment of business on a firm foundation, gains in trade and agriculture, increase in lands and cattle, respect from friends and foes.

Gemini_Jupiter_PD1.name: GeminiJupiterPD1
Gemini_Jupiter_PD1.description: Gemini - Death of wife if married or sweet heart, loss of children, brothers and cousins, deportation, fear from rulers and mental uneasiness.

Cancer_Jupiter_PD1.name: CancerJupiterPD1
Cancer_Jupiter_PD1.description: Cancer - Jupiter is exalted here and gives all beneficial results such as much political success, promotions, exalted positions, humanitarian work, national service, acquisition of wealth from unexpected sources and without efforts, journalistic success, minister of education or lands and perfect harmony in domestic life.

Leo_Jupiter_PD1.name: LeoJupiterPD1
Leo_Jupiter_PD1.description: Leo - Respect from rulers, gain of lands, much agricultural produce, and realisation of one's own desires and ambitions.

Virgo_Jupiter_PD1.name: VirgoJupiterPD1
Virgo_Jupiter_PD1.description: Virgo - Residence in foreign countries, destruction of wife and property, loss of wealth, misunderstandings among relatives, strife, body ill-health and symptoms of nervous troubles and diseases.

Libra_Jupiter_PD1.name: LibraJupiterPD1
Libra_Jupiter_PD1.description: Libra - Residence in desolate places, dissolute and shameful life, active part in perverted social reform, selfish interests, great and unbearable difficulties and troubles, tendency to create factions in societies and families.

Scorpio_Jupiter_PD1.name: ScorpioJupiterPD1
Scorpio_Jupiter_PD1.description: Scorpio - Mental calm and happiness, acquisition of new lands and estates, undisturbed progress and religious worship and philosophical discourses and triumph of spiritual influences over sensual passions, reputation at stake if aspected by malefics.

Sagittarius_Jupiter_PD1.name: SagittariusJupiterPD1
Sagittarius_Jupiter_PD1.description: Sagittarius - Many sons, much wealth, success in every undertaking, increase in relations and family members. widespread fame and perfect happiness.

Capricorn_Jupiter_PD1.name: CapricornJupiterPD1
Capricorn_Jupiter_PD1.description: Capricorn - Death or illness of children, wife always ill, loss of property, reputation and self-respect, irreligious acts, sacrilegious attacks upon sacred institutions, predominance of mean motives, liable to prosecution and the upspringing of numerous enemies.

Aquarius_Jupiter_PD1.name: AquariusJupiterPD1
Aquarius_Jupiter_PD1.description: Aquarius - Consumption and fear from wild beasts, animals, bad luck, many hardships and loss of wealth.

Pisces_Jupiter_PD1.name: PiscesJupiterPD1
Pisces_Jupiter_PD1.description: Pisces - Much fame throughout this long period of 16 years, high education and gt1in from exhibition of knowledge, acquisition of property and general success and happiness.

Aries_Saturn_PD1.name: AriesSaturnPD1
Aries_Saturn_PD1.description: Saturn In Aries - The worst period in a man's career, unexpected losses, disappointments in every undertaking, misunderstandings among relatives and friends and increase in the number of enemies.

Taurus_Saturn_PD1.name: TaurusSaturnPD1
Taurus_Saturn_PD1.description: Taurus - Success and gains in agricultural operations, much prosperity to the cattle and other domestic animals, great income, and access to things desired.

Gemini_Saturn_PD1.name: GeminiSaturnPD1
Gemini_Saturn_PD1.description: Gemini - Recognition of his services, great humanitarian work, profits in speculations and trade, respect from rulers, political success, reputation, fame and much general happiness.

Cancer_Saturn_PD1.name: CancerSaturnPD1
Cancer_Saturn_PD1.description: Cancer - Miseries and calamities, family strife, increase of enemies, trouble from relatives and physical diseases and mental affliction.

Leo_Saturn_PD1.name: LeoSaturnPD1
Leo_Saturn_PD1.description: Leo - A period of uneasiness, distrust, disappointments and unrest, misappropriation of money and consequent prosecution if Saturn is afflicted powerfully, hatred by all and courting death as a source of relief from mental worries.

Virgo_Saturn_PD1.name: VirgoSaturnPD1
Virgo_Saturn_PD1.description: Virgo - Elevation to exalted positions, royal favour, business success and establishment of fame and reputation.

Libra_Saturn_PD1.name: LibraSaturnPD1
Libra_Saturn_PD1.description: Libra - Travelling in countries inhabited by Christians and Moslems, establishment of fresh branches if proprietor of a business concern, acceptance of invitations for public lectures and great honour and respect throughout the long period of 19 years and perfect domestic happiness.

Scorpio_Saturn_PD1.name: ScorpioSaturnPD1
Scorpio_Saturn_PD1.description: Scorpio - Odium of superiors, disliked and hated by all, loss or prestige, self-respect and fame and destruction and damage to property and possessions.

Sagittarius_Saturn_PD1.name: SagittariusSaturnPD1
Sagittarius_Saturn_PD1.description: Sagittarius - Inclination to study philosophical and religious treatises and success in such studies, auspicious occasions like marriage ceremonies, etc., at home and happiness and mental peace throughout.

Capricorn_Saturn_PD1.name: CapricornSaturnPD1
Capricorn_Saturn_PD1.description: Capricorn - Increase in lands, gains in wealth and business, friendship with great and illustrious personages.

Aquarius_Saturn_PD1.name: AquariusSaturnPD1
Aquarius_Saturn_PD1.description: Aquarius - Great travelling in Western countries, success in litigation, mental happiness and acquisition of wealth.

Pisces_Saturn_PD1.name: PiscesSaturnPD1
Pisces_Saturn_PD1.description: Pisces - Pilgrimage to sacred shrines and holy places, indifference towards sectarian restrictions and observances, sorrows, misery and unrest.

Aries_Mercury_PD1.name: AriesMercuryPD1
Aries_Mercury_PD1.description: Mercury in Aries - Marriage, performance of religious and social work, charity, increase in religiousness and intelligence, favour of rulers, gains from cultivation. cattle, precious stones and conveyances and happiness through these.

Taurus_Mercury_PD1.name: TaurusMercuryPD1
Taurus_Mercury_PD1.description: Taurus - Great happiness, sexual contact with beautiful young women, getting titles and name, ornaments and authority over men, acquaintance of sweet girls and their company and practice of music and kindred sciences.

Gemini_Mercury_PD1.name: GeminiMercuryPD1
Gemini_Mercury_PD1.description: Gemini - Access to great intellectual treasures, increase in knowledge, successful termination of educational career, acquisition of fame and wealth, happiness from wife and children, marriage ceremonies and recitation of sacred scriptures.

Cancer_Mercury_PD1.name: CancerMercuryPD1
Cancer_Mercury_PD1.description: Cancer - Degradation, change of residence, fines and imprisonments, penalties. confinement in chains, hatred of relations, loss of lands. failure of crops and comity with all.

Leo_Mercury_PD1.name: LeoMercuryPD1
Leo_Mercury_PD1.description: Leo - Good courage and elevation, travelling in hilly and mountainous tracts, acquisition of wealth from various countries, progress in knowledge, expeditions to mountains, caves and similar places, marriage and great reputation.

Virgo_Mercury_PD1.name: VirgoMercuryPD1
Virgo_Mercury_PD1.description: Virgo - The most auspicious and happy period of life, favour of kings, admirers and royal courts and great success in them, undisturbed health, marriage in the house, increase in intelligence, religiousness, charitable foundings, and unexpected gains.

Libra_Mercury_PD1.name: LibraMercuryPD1
Libra_Mercury_PD1.description: Libra - Great works published in the native's name, favour of wealthy and educated people without effort, and leadership over men.

Scorpio_Mercury_PD1.name: ScorpioMercuryPD1
Scorpio_Mercury_PD1.description: Scorpio - Loss or wife, children, riches, mental troubles, losses from merchandise, great hatred of people and relations and loss of reputation and power.

Sagittarius_Mercury_PD1.name: SagittariusMercuryPD1
Sagittarius_Mercury_PD1.description: Sagittarius - Success in education, meeting with learned and religious people, worship of holy men, virtuous and charitable deeds, travelling in Eastern countries, inclination for marital enterprises and great exhilaration.

Capricorn_Mercury_PD1.name: CapricornMercuryPD1
Capricorn_Mercury_PD1.description: Capricorn - Success in trade, inception of new business-like trades in tanneries, leather goods, glassware, etc., recitation of religious scriptures. Godly contemplations, patronage of kings, destruction of foes and enemies and general success in life.

Aquarius_Mercury_PD1.name: AquariusMercuryPD1
Aquarius_Mercury_PD1.description: Aquarius - Acquisition of paraphernalia, access to good and much wealth, indulging in a pleasurely life and good fame and name.

Pisces_Mercury_PD1.name: PiscesMercuryPD1
Pisces_Mercury_PD1.description: Pisces - Trouble from thieves, dysentery, destruction of relations, litigation, quarrels with relatives, mental derangement, nervous breakdown and failure in attempts.

Aries_Ketu_PD1.name: AriesKetuPD1
Aries_Ketu_PD1.description: Ketu in Aries - Disgrace, troubles from relatives, loss of property, cattle and other domestic animals, constant travels in Eastern countries, great hardship, sudden quarrels, loss of mother and wife or their serious sickness, want of prudence and capacity in private matters.

Taurus_Ketu_PD1.name: TaurusKetuPD1
Taurus_Ketu_PD1.description: Taurus - Many dangers, death of wife, acquisition of wealth through evil ways and means, sexual sorrows, visits to sacred shrines and holy waters, inclination to religious study and success in it, compunction and in the end appeasing sins by resort to foul stratagems.

Gemini_Ketu_PD1.name: GeminiKetuPD1
Gemini_Ketu_PD1.description: Gemini - Good health, happiness, elevation to responsible and exalted positions, rounding of sacred institutions, good food, advent of relations and in later years venereal troubles, death of near relation and loss of reputation and self-respect.

Cancer_Ketu_PD1.name: CancerKetuPD1
Cancer_Ketu_PD1.description: Cancer - Many dangers, disturbances from his place and a period of exile, serious sickness to wife, parents or children, and if badly afflicted, their death, quarrels with friends, initiation into the mysteries of philosophical knowledge.

Leo_Ketu_PD1.name: LeoKetuPD1
Leo_Ketu_PD1.description: Leo - Increase of lands, cultivation. progress in education, heated debates and discussions on philosophical and scientific subjects with great scholars and eminent people, attracted by females and company with them, travels in mountainous tracts and billy countries to spread any righteous cause, and treated to great musical entertainment.

Virgo_Ketu_PD1.name: VirgoKetuPD1
Virgo_Ketu_PD1.description: Virgo - Fear from fires, weapons and poisonous gases, beasts and reptiles, destruction of dear lives, properties and self-respect, unrighteous acts and nasty venereal complaints.

Libra_Ketu_PD1.name: LibraKetuPD1
Libra_Ketu_PD1.description: Libra - Happiness and prosperity to wife or husband, self and children, enmity of relations, gains from gold and precious stones, headache, heart disease, nervous breakdown, trouble in the anus and much discontent.

Scorpio_Ketu_PD1.name: ScorpioKetuPD1
Scorpio_Ketu_PD1.description: Scorpio - Living dependent on relations, sycophant acts, acquisition of much wealth. loss of few children, gains from lands, contraction of new friendship from among the members of the fair sex and liable to suffer from venereal complaints.

Sagittarius_Ketu_PD1.name: SagittariusKetuPD1
Sagittarius_Ketu_PD1.description: Sagittarius - Perfect domestic harmony and happiness, favour from aristocrats, progress in education, religious discussions, moral elevation and manifestation of a spirit of tolerance and equality.

Capricorn_Ketu_PD1.name: CapricornKetuPD1
Capricorn_Ketu_PD1.description: Capricorn - Misappropriation of private and governmental funds and consequent prosecution, wife or husband catching consumption and such diseases, death of a few children, anxiety about everything, misunderstanding with relations and disgrace and disappointments.

Aquarius_Ketu_PD1.name: AquariusKetuPD1
Aquarius_Ketu_PD1.description: Aquarius - Hating all and hated by all, incurring the displeasure of superiors, pessimistic about every hope, abject dependency and servile flattery; in the end, happiness and prosperity to wife and children.

Pisces_Ketu_PD1.name: PiscesKetuPD1
Pisces_Ketu_PD1.description: Pisces - Learned discussions, general success, helping the suffering, mental depression, promotion, acquisition of fertile lands, favour of the superiors and moneyed people, moral and religious devotions, vigorous and clear understanding, travel on water to distant countries and respect there.

Aries_Venus_PD1.name: AriesVenusPD1
Aries_Venus_PD1.description: Venus in Aries - Residence in palatial buildings, acquaintance with noble personages, wearing good clothes, good earnings, spread of fame, much respect, birth of child, happy sexual relations and praised by friends and enemies.

Taurus_Venus_PD1.name: TaurusVenusPD1
Taurus_Venus_PD1.description: Taurus - A life of great ease and indulgence throughout the period of 20 years, enjoyment of much happiness, company of beautiful girls and joy through association with them, travels on seas to foreign countries particularly southern, all ambitions of life fairly realised, redemption from debts, symptoms of venereal troubles.

Gemini_Venus_PD1.name: GeminiVenusPD1
Gemini_Venus_PD1.description: Gemini - Gain of territory, affording protection to brothers, sisters, cousins and paternal uncles and aunts, gain of vehicles, increase of reputation, children. harmony with wife, mental peace and a check over inclination to indulge in loose life.

Cancer_Venus_PD1.name: CancerVenusPD1
Cancer_Venus_PD1.description: Cancer - Paroxysms of grief and terror, destruction of property, discontent with relations, increase of enemies, loss of wealth, disturbance to good work and some mental ease in the end.

Leo_Venus_PD1.name: LeoVenusPD1
Leo_Venus_PD1.description: Leo - Mental disease and sorrow, troubles from fires, poisons and hurts, evil women, foul language and mental disorder, exile, and aimless wanderings in deserts and woods to evade detection by law, dangerous sickness to the better half or a child, stigma on self-respect due to mean fellows and inclination to conceal true identity.

Virgo_Venus_PD1.name: VirgoVenusPD1
Virgo_Venus_PD1.description: Virgo - Quarrels with wife or husband and separation from him or her, mortgage of all property, trouble in the generative organ often leading to surgical operation, symptoms of arthritis, troubles relating to nervous breakdown, mental unrest, separation from relatives and friends and much grief and sorrow.

Libra_Venus_PD1.name: LibraVenusPD1
Libra_Venus_PD1.description: Libra - Great reputation, gain of wealth from royal patronage, comforts, good enjoyment of life, luxurious invitations and worships of mammon and a period of extreme sensuality.

Scorpio_Venus_PD1.name: ScorpioVenusPD1
Scorpio_Venus_PD1.description: Scorpio - Hatred for all, many miseries and troubles, serious risks, vengeance against relatives, loss of wealth and property, mental affliction and imbalance.

Sagittarius_Venus_PD1.name: SagittariusVenusPD1
Sagittarius_Venus_PD1.description: Sagittarius - Much fame and name, religious _and philosophical studies, recitation of sacred writings, regard for holy people and ascetics, success in any undertakings and general prosperity.

Capricorn_Venus_PD1.name: CapricornVenusPD1
Capricorn_Venus_PD1.description: Capricorn - Travels in foreign lands, freedom from domestic worries, discussion with learned people, progress in general education, acquaintance with low class people, development of perverted ideas of social or religious reform and success in all endeavors.

Aquarius_Venus_PD1.name: AquariusVenusPD1
Aquarius_Venus_PD1.description: Aquarius - Acquisition of fresh property, a good library, lands and houses, honours and unexpected gains, love for Christian or Islamic literature and its studies, stray intercourse with senile women, domestic happiness and harmony.

Pisces_Venus_PD1.name: PiscesVenusPD1
Pisces_Venus_PD1.description: Pisces - High political power and great success, promotion to responsible office, acts of charity and generosity, exercise of prudence in official matters and perfect happiness in domestic life and smooth-sailing in every respect.

gochara.name: GocharaSummary
gochara.description: Combination of all gochara occurring at time.

gochara.name: SunGocharaInHouse1
gochara.description: When the Sun traverses through the Rasi occupied by the Moon, the person suffers from loss of wealth, loss of prestige, sickness and will have many obstacles and aimless travels. Financial loss, discomfort, chest pain and aimless journey

gochara.name: SunGocharaInHouse2
gochara.description: When he transits in the 2nd house, there will be loss of wealth, he will suffer deceit, he will have full of financial worries. Increase of expenditure, eye trouble, deceit and unhappiness

gochara.name: SunGocharaInHouse3
gochara.description: In the 3rd house there will be advent of money, happiness, relief from diseases, recognition from superiors, honours and courage. Increase of emoluments, freedom from sickness and destruction of enemies

gochara.name: SunGocharaInHouse4
gochara.description: In the 4th house, there will be diseases, constant attacks from opponents, no peace of mind, pressure from creditors, and sorrow and misery. Quarrels with wife, unhappiness in conjugal life and the general ailments

gochara.name: SunGocharaInHouse5
gochara.description: The Sun transiting the 5th will cause mental agitation, ill-health, embarrassment and accidents. Increase of enemies and physical indisposition

gochara.name: SunGocharaInHouse6
gochara.description: The Sun in the 6th gives rise to release from sorrows, worries and troubles, destruction of enemies and peace of mind. Success over enemies, joy and good health.

gochara.name: SunGocharaInHouse7
gochara.description: The Sun transiting the 7th, produces wearisome travelling, colic and anal troubles, humiliation and sickness. Wearisome travelling, chest pain and stomach troubles.

gochara.name: SunGocharaInHouse8
gochara.description: In the 8th, Sun's progress gives rise to quarrels with friends, diseases, high blood pressure, royal and official displeasure. Misunderstandings with or separation from wife.

gochara.name: SunGocharaInHouse9
gochara.description: The Sun's transit in the 9th house will cause to the native danger, humiliation, dependency, disappointment and separation. Accidents, stomach trouble, mental worry and opposition.

gochara.name: SunGocharaInHouse10
gochara.description: One will accomplish his desire and plans, and success will attend on all kinds or undertakings when the Sun is in the 10th. Success in endeavors, honour and realisation of ambition

gochara.name: SunGocharaInHouse11
gochara.description: In the 11th, the passage of the Sun will confer on a person honour, health, wealth and success. Great success, respect, freedom from disease and prosperity.

gochara.name: SunGocharaInHouse12
gochara.description: When the Sun passes through the 12th house, there will be sorrow, creation of a situation which causes loss to everything, quarrels and ill-health.

gochara.name: MoonGocharaInHouse1
gochara.description: When the Moon transits the sign occupied by her at the time of birth of a person, the native will get excellent food, bed and clothes. Good food, comforts and clothes

gochara.name: MoonGocharaInHouse2
gochara.description: When the Moon passes through the 2nd house, loss of respect and of money and obstacles in the way of success are to be predicted. Loss of respect, money and increase of obstacles.

gochara.name: MoonGocharaInHouse3
gochara.description: In the 3rd house, the native gets clothes, pleasure from wife and finance. Domestic happiness and access to money

gochara.name: MoonGocharaInHouse4
gochara.description: In the 4th, he becomes mentally uneasy. Loss of trust in others and lack of peace of mind.

gochara.name: MoonGocharaInHouse5
gochara.description: In the 5th, suffers from humility, ill-health, pain of mind and other obstacles. Indisposition, grief and disappointment;

gochara.name: MoonGocharaInHouse6
gochara.description: In the 6th, enjoys wealth, health, comfort, redemption from enemies. Happiness, success over enemies and good health.

gochara.name: MoonGocharaInHouse7
gochara.description: 7th house, conveyances, good food and financial equilibrium. Respect from others and sudden influx of unexpected resources.

gochara.name: MoonGocharaInHouse8
gochara.description: The Moon transiting the 8th produces misery, ill-health and fear from unexpected sources. Apprehension, uneasiness and worry.

gochara.name: MoonGocharaInHouse9
gochara.description: In the 9th from herself, pain of mind, chest pain, fatigue of body and the like are caused. Mental pain, stomach trouble and incarceration.

gochara.name: MoonGocharaInHouse10
gochara.description: When the Moon passes through the 10th house, success will attend in every sphere of activity. Success, authority and position, realisation of ambition.

gochara.name: MoonGocharaInHouse11
gochara.description: In the 11th house, the person will enjoy prosperity, will get wealth and new friends. Prosperity, new friends and good income

gochara.name: MoonGocharaInHouse12
gochara.description: When the Moon transits through the 12th sign. He suffers from accidents and injuries. Injuries due to fall from vehicles and increased expenditure.

gochara.name: MarsGocharaInHouse1
gochara.description: When Mars passes through tbe sign occupied by the Moon at the time of birth of a person, be will suffer from troubles. Troubles from various sources and bodily affliction.

gochara.name: MarsGocharaInHouse2
gochara.description: In the 2nd house from the Moon displeasure of king, and suffering from quarrels, from enemies and disgrace is indicated. There will be fear from thieves and the body will be afflicted with bilious and windy complaints. Trouble from the Government, frequent quarrels with enemies, disease, accidents, bilious and windy complaints and loss by theft.

gochara.name: MarsGocharaInHouse3
gochara.description: Mars transiting the 3rd gives rise to gain of objects, pleasure from children, good health, access to riches and new clothes. Benefits through auspicious characters, financial improvement and acquisition of woolen articles and also authority.

gochara.name: MarsGocharaInHouse4
gochara.description: In the 4th sign, Mars produces evil results such as fever, digestive troubles, blood discharges and depravity of character. Fever, stomachache, piles and blood discharges and frequent trouble from ailments.

gochara.name: MarsGocharaInHouse5
gochara.description: Enemies will increase, fresh diseases will make their appearance and mental peace will be completely absent when Mars passes through the 5th house. Trouble from enemies, illness, misunderstandings with children and loss of physical energy.

gochara.name: MarsGocharaInHouse6
gochara.description: In the 6th house, relief from troubles, worries and ill-health should be predicted; he leads an independent life, obtains riches and becomes pretty cheerful. Success over enemies, termination of strife in the family, and acquisition of self-confidence

gochara.name: MarsGocharaInHouse7
gochara.description: When transiting the 7th, tbe native quarrels with wife or husband, eye troubles, stomach-ache, indigestion, etc., are also likely to be felt. Frequent quarrels with wife, eye trouble and stomachache.

gochara.name: MarsGocharaInHouse8
gochara.description: Mars transiting in the 8th produces quite unfavorable effects, such as discharging of blood, loss of wealth, disgrace and mental worry. Loss of blood from piles and anemia and loss of wealth and name.

gochara.name: MarsGocharaInHouse9
gochara.description: Mars transiting in the 9th produces quite unfavorable effects, such as discharging of blood, loss of wealth, disgrace and mental worry.In addition, the subject becomes extremely weak. Suffering from insults, heavy expenditure and weakness due to ill-health.

gochara.name: MarsGocharaInHouse10
gochara.description: His transiting the 10th produces quite favourable results. Amounts due will be realised. Success will attend on his ventures. Business will improve. Acquisition of money from unexpected source.

gochara.name: MarsGocharaInHouse11
gochara.description: His transiting the 11th produces quite favourable results. Amounts due will be realised. Success will attend on his ventures. Business will improve. Fame, reputation and authority

gochara.name: MarsGocharaInHouse12
gochara.description: In the 12th house, however,he will suffer from various expenses, troubles, diseases of the eye, pinpricks from an angry wife, from bilious complaints and various other worries. Unforeseen expenses, quarrels with wife, eye disease and bilious affections

gochara.name: MercuryGocharaInHouse1
gochara.description: When Mercury passes through the sign occupied by the Moon at time of birth of a person, such person will suffer loss of wealth caused by the advice of wicked men, by talebearers, by imprisonment and quarrels. He will, besides, receive disagreeable intelligence when in his journey. Loss of money due to advice by wicked men, worry due to association with tale-bearers, quarrels, imprisonment and disagreeable news while travelling

gochara.name: MercuryGocharaInHouse2
gochara.description: When Mercury passes through the 2nd house, the person will suffer disgrace but gains success and wealth. Disgrace, ill-treatment from relatives but acquisition of success and wealth

gochara.name: MercuryGocharaInHouse3
gochara.description: When he passes through tbe 3rd house, the subject will get friends, will be afraid of troubles from the king and from his enemies, he will quit his place due to his wicked deeds. New friends, but anticipation of trouble from government and enemies, aimless roaming about due to misdeeds

gochara.name: MercuryGocharaInHouse4
gochara.description: When Mercury passes through the 4th house, the person's kinsmen and family will increase and there will be much gain. Prosperity for relatives and family members, addition to family and gain of money.

gochara.name: MercuryGocharaInHouse5
gochara.description: In the 5th house, the person will quarrel with his wife and sons and will not enjoy the company of an excellent wife. Quarrels with wife and children.

gochara.name: MercuryGocharaInHouse6
gochara.description: In the 6th house,the person will be liked by all and will gain renown. Gain of renown, success and popularity.

gochara.name: MercuryGocharaInHouse7
gochara.description: In the 7th house, the person's appearance becomes less bright and there will be quarrels. Bloodlessness, quarrels and mental uneasiness.

gochara.name: MercuryGocharaInHouse8
gochara.description: When Mercury passes through the 8th house, the person will get sons, success, clothes and wealth and will become happy and powerful. Birth of an issue, success, happiness and acquisition of new articles.

gochara.name: MercuryGocharaInHouse9
gochara.description: When he passes through the 9th house from the Moon, the person will meet with obstacles in his work. Obstacles and mental worry.

gochara.name: MercuryGocharaInHouse10
gochara.description: In the 10th house, the person's enemies will meet with ruin and the person will get wealth, will enjoy the company of his wife and will be dressed in the flannel. Defeat of enemies, acquisition of money, happiness with wife and agreeable company.

gochara.name: MercuryGocharaInHouse11
gochara.description: When Mercury passes through the 11th house from the Moon, the person will get wealth, comfort, sons, women, friends and conveyance and will be happy and will receive good intelligence. Acquisition of wealth; birth of a son and happiness.

gochara.name: MercuryGocharaInHouse12
gochara.description: In the 12th, the person will suffer disgrace from his enemies, will suffer from diseases and will not enjoy the company of a good wife. Disgrace from enemies, disease and domestic disharmony.

gochara.name: JupiterGocharaInHouse1
gochara.description: When Jupiter passes through the sign occupied by the Moon at the time of birth of a person, such person will lose his wealth and intelligence, will quit his place and will suffer from many quarrels. Loss of money and intelligence, aimless roaming about and frequent quarrels.

gochara.name: JupiterGocharaInHouse2
gochara.description: When Jupiter passes through the 2nd house from the Moon, the person will have no enemies and will enjoy wealth and women. Happiness, domestic harmony and success over enemies.

gochara.name: JupiterGocharaInHouse3
gochara.description: When Jupiter passes through the 3rd house from the Moon, the person will quit his place and will meet with obstacles in his work. Moving about from place to place, obstacles to own work and loss of position.

gochara.name: JupiterGocharaInHouse4
gochara.description: When Jupiter passes through the 4th house from the Moon, the person will suffer from troubles caused by his kinsmen, will become patient and resigned and will delight in nothing. Troubles from relatives, development of a sense of resignation to the inevitable.

gochara.name: JupiterGocharaInHouse5
gochara.description: When Jupiter passes through the 5th house from the Moon, the person will get servants, prosperity, sons, elephants, houses, bullocks, gold, women, clothes, gems and good qualities. Acquisition of servants, birth of a son, general prosperity, addition of property and development of good qualities.

gochara.name: JupiterGocharaInHouse6
gochara.description: When Jupiter passes through the 6th house from the Moon, the person will be so much afflicted at heart that he will take no delight in the agreeable faces of beautiful women, in the music of the peacock and the cuckoo and in houses made pleasant by the frolic of children playing like the young of the deer. Affliction of mind, friends turning enemies and indifferent to good things.

gochara.name: JupiterGocharaInHouse7
gochara.description: When Jupiter passes through the 7th house from the Moon, the person will enjoy good bed, the company of an excellent woman, wealth, good meals, flowers, conveyance and the like and be will be of good speech and intelligence. Happiness, erotic pleasure, good income, purchase of a conveyance and graceful speech

gochara.name: JupiterGocharaInHouse8
gochara.description: When Jupiter passes through the 8th house from the Moon, the person will suffer from imprisonment, diseases, heavy grief, the fatigue of journey and serious illness. Imprisonment, disease, heavy grief and serious illness.

gochara.name: JupiterGocharaInHouse9
gochara.description: When Jupiter passes through the 9th house from the Moon, the person will become efficient at work and influential and he will get sons, success in work, wealth and gain. Influential, birth of an issue, success in work and acquisition of wealth from an unexpected source.

gochara.name: JupiterGocharaInHouse10
gochara.description: When Jupiter passes through the 10th house from the Moon, the person will quit his place and suffer loss of health and wealth. Destruction of position, loss of money and health and aimless roaming about.

gochara.name: JupiterGocharaInHouse11
gochara.description: When Jupiter passes through the 11th house, the person will return to his country and will recover his health and wealth. Reinstatement in former position, and recovery of health.

gochara.name: JupiterGocharaInHouse12
gochara.description: When Jupiter passes through the 12th house, the person will suffer grief in his return journey. Fall from ideals and right conduct and increase of grief.

gochara.name: VenusGocharaInHouse1
gochara.description: When Venus passes through the sign occupied by the Moon at the time of birth of a person, such a person will enjoy excellent perfumes, flowers, clothes, houses, bed, meals and women. Acquisition of comforts for pleasure, and a happy life.

gochara.name: VenusGocharaInHouse2
gochara.description: When Venus passes through the 2nd house from the Moon, the person will get sons, wealth, grain and presents from the king; will have a prosperous family, will enjoy flowers and gems and will be of bright appearance. Acquisition of money and gifts, birth of an issue and erotic pleasure.

gochara.name: VenusGocharaInHouse3
gochara.description: When Venus passes through the 3rd house from the Moon, the person will become influential, wealthy and respectable and will get clothes. His enemies will meet with ruin. Influence, wealth and respect.

gochara.name: VenusGocharaInHouse4
gochara.description: When Venus passes through the 4th house, the person will get friends and will become greatly powerful. Disgrace to enemies and general prosperity.

gochara.name: VenusGocharaInHouse5
gochara.description: When Venus passes through the 5th house, the person will be happy, will get kinsmen, sons, wealth and friends and will not suffer defeat by the enemy. Renewal of contact with friends, increase of reputation, influence and power.

gochara.name: VenusGocharaInHouse6
gochara.description: When Venus passes through the 6th house from the Moon, the person will suffer disgrace, will be afflicted with diseases and will be exposed to danger. General happiness, extension of business, birth of an issue and good income.

gochara.name: VenusGocharaInHouse7
gochara.description: When Venus passes through the 7th house, the person will suffer injuries through women. Humiliation, disease and danger.

gochara.name: VenusGocharaInHouse8
gochara.description: When Venus passes through the 8th house from the Moon, the person will get houses, articles of lacquer and beautiful women. Injuries and trouble from women and mental worry.

gochara.name: VenusGocharaInHouse9
gochara.description: When Venus passes through the 9th house from the Moon, the person will become virtuous, happy and wealthy and he will get plenty or clothes. Acquisition of a new house, articles of luxury and wife if not married.

gochara.name: VenusGocharaInHouse10
gochara.description: When Venus passes through the 10th house from the Moon, the person will suffer disgrace and will also suffer quarrels. Increase of virtue, happiness, wealth and performance of religious acts.

gochara.name: VenusGocharaInHouse11
gochara.description: When Venus passes through the 11th house from the Moon, the person will get wealth of his friends and will also get perfumes and clothes. Quarrels and disgrace.

gochara.name: VenusGocharaInHouse12
gochara.description: When Venus passes through the 12th house, the person will get very few clothes. Acquisition of new friends, money, perfumes and clothes.

gochara.name: SaturnGocharaInHouse1
gochara.description: When Saturn passes through the sign occupied by the Moon at the time of his birth, such person will suffer from poison and from fire, will quit his kinsmen, will suffer from imprisonment and torture, will travel to foreign lands and live with his friend there, will suffer miseries, loss of wealth and or sons, will suffer also from the fatigues of foot journey and from humiliation. Fear from poison or fire, of friends and family members, fear of incarceration, travel to foreign lands, loss of money and near relatives, separation from kith and kin and suffering from insults.

gochara.name: SaturnGocharaInHouse2
gochara.description: When Saturn passes through the 2nd house from the Moon, the person will suffer from loss of beauty and comfort, will become weak and will get wealth from other men but will not enjoy this wealth long. Emaciated physical appearance, loss of comfort, acquisition but not enjoyment of wealth

gochara.name: SaturnGocharaInHouse3
gochara.description: When Saturn passes through the 3rd house from the Moon, the person will get wealth, servants, articles of enjoyment, camels, buffaloes, elephants, asses and horses. He will become influential, happy, free from disease and will become greatly powerful and will defeat his enemies in fight. Increase of wealth and other comforts, good health, general happiness and disappearance of enemies.

gochara.name: SaturnGocharaInHouse4
gochara.description: When Saturn passes through the 4th house from the Moon, the person will be separated from his friends, wealth, and wife and ever suspecting evil in everything, will never feel happy. Separation from friends and family members, suspicious nature, crooked behaviour and wicked acts.

gochara.name: SaturnGocharaInHouse5
gochara.description: When Saturn passes through the 5th house from the Moon, the person will be separated from his sons and wealth and will suffer from quarrels. Separation from sons, loss of money and frequent quarrels.

gochara.name: SaturnGocharaInHouse6
gochara.description: When Saturn passes through the 6th house from the Moon, the person will be freed from his enemies and diseases and will enjoy the company of women. Freedom from enemies and diseases association with fair sex.

gochara.name: SaturnGocharaInHouse7
gochara.description: When Saturn passes through the 7th or 8th house from the Moon, the person will be separated from his wife and sons, will travel on foot in a pitiable condition. Separation from wife and children and aimless roaming about.

gochara.name: SaturnGocharaInHouse8
gochara.description: When Saturn passes through the 7th or 8th house from the Moon, the person will be separated from his wife and sons, will travel on foot in a pitiable condition. Indulgence in mean activities and bereft of happiness.

gochara.name: SaturnGocharaInHouse9
gochara.description: When he passes through the 9th house, the person will be separated from his wife and sons, will travel on foot in a pitiable condition. Besides that, suffer from hatred, chest pain, imprisonment and in consequence will not properly observe the daily duties. Indulgence in mean activities and bereft of happiness. Suffers from hatred, heart trouble and even imprisonment.

gochara.name: SaturnGocharaInHouse10
gochara.description: When Saturn passes through the 10th house, the person will get work and will suffer loss of wealth, learning and fame. Gets new avocation, but loses money and fame.

gochara.name: SaturnGocharaInHouse11
gochara.description: When Saturn passes through the 11th house from the Moon, the person will become cruel and will get women and wealth. Frequent loss of temper but acquisition of wealth through wrong means.

gochara.name: SaturnGocharaInHouse12
gochara.description: When Saturn passes through the 12th house from the Moon, the person will suffer from much grief. Grief, series of miseries, ill-health and general affliction.

gochara.name: RahuGocharaInHouse1
gochara.description: When Rahu passes through the sign occupied by the Moon at the time of his birth, such person will suffer from poison and from fire, will quit his kinsmen, will suffer from imprisonment and torture, will travel to foreign lands and live with his friend there, will suffer miseries, loss of wealth and or sons, will suffer also from the fatigues of foot journey and from humiliation.

gochara.name: RahuGocharaInHouse2
gochara.description: When Rahu passes through the 2nd house from the Moon, the person will suffer from loss of beauty and comfort, will become weak and will get wealth from other men but will not enjoy this wealth long.

gochara.name: RahuGocharaInHouse3
gochara.description: When Rahu passes through the 3rd house from the Moon, the person will get wealth, servants, articles of enjoyment, camels, buffaloes, elephants, asses and horses. He will become influential, happy, free from disease and will become greatly powerful and will defeat his enemies in fight.

gochara.name: RahuGocharaInHouse4
gochara.description: When Rahu passes through the 4th house from the Moon, the person will be separated from his friends, wealth, and wife and ever suspecting evil in everything, will never feel happy.

gochara.name: RahuGocharaInHouse5
gochara.description: When Rahu passes through the 5th house from the Moon, the person will be separated from his sons and wealth and will suffer from quarrels.

gochara.name: RahuGocharaInHouse6
gochara.description: When Rahu passes through the 6th house from the Moon, the person will be freed from his enemies and diseases and will enjoy the company of women.

gochara.name: RahuGocharaInHouse7
gochara.description: When Rahu passes through the 7th or 8th house from the Moon, the person will be separated from his wife and sons, will travel on foot in a pitiable condition.

gochara.name: RahuGocharaInHouse8
gochara.description: When Rahu passes through the 7th or 8th house from the Moon, the person will be separated from his wife and sons, will travel on foot in a pitiable condition.

gochara.name: RahuGocharaInHouse9
gochara.description: When he passes through the 9th house, the person will be separated from his wife and sons, will travel on foot in a pitiable condition. Besides that, suffer from hatred, chest pain, imprisonment and in consequence will not properly observe the daily duties.

gochara.name: RahuGocharaInHouse10
gochara.description: When Rahu passes through the 10th house, the person will get work and will suffer loss of wealth, learning and fame.

gochara.name: RahuGocharaInHouse11
gochara.description: When Rahu passes through the 11th house from the Moon, the person will become cruel and will get women and wealth.

gochara.name: RahuGocharaInHouse12
gochara.description: When Rahu passes through the 12th house from the Moon, the person will suffer from much grief.

gochara.name: KetuGocharaInHouse1
gochara.description: When Ketu passes through tbe sign occupied by the Moon at the time of birth of a person, be will suffer from troubles.

gochara.name: KetuGocharaInHouse2
gochara.description: In the 2nd house from the Moon displeasure of king, and suffering from quarrels, from enemies and disgrace is indicated. There will be fear from thieves and the body will be afflicted with bilious and windy complaints.

gochara.name: KetuGocharaInHouse3
gochara.description: Ketu transiting the 3rd gives rise to gain of objects, pleasure from children, good health, access to riches and new clothes.

gochara.name: KetuGocharaInHouse4
gochara.description: In the 4th sign, Ketu produces evil results such as fever, digestive troubles, blood discharges and depravity of character.

gochara.name: KetuGocharaInHouse5
gochara.description: Enemies will increase, fresh diseases will make their appearance and mental peace will be completely absent when Ketu passes through the 5th house.

gochara.name: KetuGocharaInHouse6
gochara.description: In the 6th house, relief from troubles, worries and ill-health should be predicted; he leads an independent life, obtains riches and becomes pretty cheerful.

gochara.name: KetuGocharaInHouse7
gochara.description: When transiting the 7th, tbe native quarrels with wife or husband, eye troubles, stomach-ache, indigestion, etc., are also likely to be felt.

gochara.name: KetuGocharaInHouse8
gochara.description: Ketu transiting in the 8th produces quite unfavorable effects, such as discharging of blood, loss of wealth, disgrace and mental worry.

gochara.name: KetuGocharaInHouse9
gochara.description: Ketu transiting in the 9th produces quite unfavorable effects, such as discharging of blood, loss of wealth, disgrace and mental worry.In addition, the subject becomes extremely weak.

gochara.name: KetuGocharaInHouse10
gochara.description: His transiting the 10th produces quite favourable results. Amounts due will be realised. Success will attend on his ventures. Business will improve.

gochara.name: KetuGocharaInHouse11
gochara.description: His transiting the 11th produces quite favourable results. Amounts due will be realised. Success will attend on his ventures. Business will improve.

gochara.name: KetuGocharaInHouse12
gochara.description: In the 12th house, however,he will suffer from various expenses, troubles, diseases of the eye, pinpricks from an angry wife, from bilious complaints and various other worries.

ashtakvarga_gochara.description: equal dose of good and bad

ashtakvarga_gochara.description: quarrel with the people of the locality and relatives

ashtakvarga_gochara.description: acquisition of administrative control over a village or town

ashtakvarga_gochara.name: SaturnTransit7Bindu
ashtakvarga_gochara.description: acquisition of servants and domestic animals

ashtakvarga_gochara.name: SaturnTransit6Bindu
